#summary Description of the /game/events/ page.
#labels Phase-Design

=== Introduction ===
The game events page is used to get the latest game events.

=== Method ===
HTTP GET 

=== Request ===
_none_

=== Response ===
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<events lastEventNumber="58">
 <event>
  <msg>Deal in the river.</msg>
  <cards type="river">
    <card suit="hearts">K</card>
  </cards>
 </event>
 <event>
  <msg>Deal to you personally.</msg>
  <cards type="private">
    <card suit="hearts">2</card>
  </cards>
 </event>
 <event><msg>Kenzo bets.</msg></event>
</events>
}}}
